item.title: Box continues to expand beyond just data sharing, with agent-driven enterprise AI studio and no-code apps
item.description: Box debuts its largest set of updates ever, with agent driven enterprise AI data studio and no code apps.

item.title: Magic Story launches AI-based media platform for children to create their own adventures
item.description: Magic Story, an AI-powered media platform for kids to create adventures, has launched its customized books and subscription platform.

item.title: AMD unveils Versal Premium Series Gen 2 for data center workloads
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices announced its Versal Premium Series Gen 2 chip platform for data center customers doing AI processing and other work.

item.title: DataRobot launches Enterprise AI Suite to bridge gap between AI development and business value
item.description: DataRobot aims to boost AI success with a new Enterprise Suite featuring pre-built templates, AI agents, observability and governance tools.

item.title: Edge data is critical to AI — here’s how Dell is helping enterprises unlock its value
item.description: In this age of AI, enterprises need to be able to quickly access and extract value from edge data. Here's how Dell is helping them do it.
